amendatorysection.catchline: Income tax form; contribution to Campaign Finance Limitation Cash Fund.
amendatorysection.para: Beginning with the tax form filed for the 1994 tax year, the Tax Commissioner shall include on the individual income tax form space in which the individual taxpayer may, if a refund is due, designate one dollar or a greater amount of such refund as a contribution to the Campaign Finance Limitation Cash Fund created in section 32-1610.
